snippet: In an effort to pitch Denny’s to consumers aged 18 to 25, the company is producing a Web series that strikes a decidedly provocative tone.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column on Denny's efforts to pitch to consumers aged 18 to 25; company is producing a Web series that is decidedly provocative; online advertising push is a stark contrast from the chain's traditional advertising, which is humorous but far from edgy, befitting a family restaurant.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to pitch Denny’s to consumers aged 18 to 25, the company is producing a Web series that strikes a decidedly provocative tone.

headline.seo: Denny’s Uses Web Series to Speak to Young Adults
headline.main: Denny’s Uses Web Series to Speak to Young Adults
headline.print_headline: Denny’s Uses Web Series to Speak to Young Adults
